title: Authorized Single Team User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into a single team user account
AND the single team user has MVPD auth
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game from:
ABC
ESPN
ESPN2
TBS
FOX
custom_expected: THEN the game will launch and the user receives playback

title: Single Team MVPD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into a single team account
AND the user is not entitled with MVPD linked
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game from:
ABC
ESPN
ESPN2
TBS
FOX
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have to go through MVPD flow through cable provider to get access to game
AND video playback will begin

title: MLB Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into a single team account
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the audio button from the scores page, team scoreboard (team page) or the more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user will have access to the game audio streams

title: International User Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into an entitled account
AND the user is located outside US terrritory
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game from:
ABC
ESPN
ESPN2
TBS
FOX

FROM the watch page, team scoreboard, and score page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a blackout message
AND the user will not have to go through an MVPD flow

title: MLB Audio
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into an account
AND the user is not located in the US territory
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Audio button on the team scoreboard, scores page, or more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user will have access to the game audio feeds

title: MVPD Login Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into an MLB.tv account
AND the user does not have MVPD connected to that account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game from:
ABC
ESPN
ESPN2
TBS
FOX
custom_expected:
THEN the user will get an MVPD flow prompt
AND the user will receive media playback once they input their tv cable provider credentials and complete flow

title: Exec User Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into their exec account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game from:
ABC
ESPN
ESPN2
TBS
FOX
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not receive an MVPD flow
AND the user will be allowed access to the video player feed right away
AND the user will not receive a blackout message

title: MLB Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into an executive account
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on MLB audio from team scoreboard, scores or more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user will have access to game audio streams

title: Anon User Paywall
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is NOT logged into an account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game from:
ABC
ESPN
ESPN2
TBS
FOX

From MLB.tv buttons from MLB Scores, Team Page, and Game Tiles from Watch
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive an MLB.tv paywall

title: MLB Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is NOT logged into an account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Audio button in the more menu
OR the Audio button on the team page scoreboard
OR the Audio button on the scores page
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive an MLB Audio Paywall

title: Free User Paywall
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into an account without any credentials or purchases
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game from:
ABC
ESPN
ESPN2
TBS
FOX

From mlb.tv buttons on team page and scores, or game tiles from Watch Tab
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive an MLB.tv paywall

title: MLB Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in without any credentials or purchases
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Audio button in the more menu
OR the Audio button on the team page scoreboard
OR the Audio button on the scores page
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive an MLB Audio Paywall
